text: (( Understandable, I hope things went well
They did! And now I’m officially off until Saturday other than some minor work I need to tidy up.
(( that's great news! glad it went well!
Thanks!
Oh hey, I found a monster osumatsu au earlier in the week and was thinking we could maybe incorporate it here? like spending so much time with monsters turns the Matsu into a monster
(( that could be a really interesting idea! I like it
Totty turns out to be a mermaid in the version I found so that could be fun

(( yeah! maybe they kind of "train" him to fit the role of a mermaid by seeing how long he can hold his breath, along with some sort of potion that gives him those features as they train him more and more

Then they can have him out of water and watch him drag himself around with his arms since he wouldn’t have legs anymore. And if we added a second Matsu, Jyushi is a werewolf so they could give him a collar and a dog house.
(( oh, good ideas! totty would be pretty helpless without legs, and Jyushi would make a good werewolf! maybe they train him to be obedient like a dog?
Yup! I was thinking they go in together and well...don’t come out.
And because im incredibly terrible after not being able to respond for a while I had a new idea
(( oh, I'd love to hear it!

One of the Matsus finally gets a job as a secretary and that goes about as well as one could expect when the actual position is boss’s new sex toy. I was thinking a little set up on a rolling platform that they can push themselves around on but their hands are cuffed to where they can’t be fully extended and they’re collared and ring gagged for maximum use. Still capable of running office errands
(( oh, that sounds fun! maybe the other workers are aware of this and frequently humiliate and jeer at him him when he isn't being used by the boss
(( do you have a reference for what the rolling platform would look like?

Not exactly? I’ve just been working with a lot of dollies recently so I’ve been surrounded by moving platforms. Basically just a platform the Matsu could sit on with four beams on the corners with horizontal supports that would trap him inside. Hands cuffed to the vertical beams and an x-shape at the top that would form into the circle collar
(( alright, sounds good! should we make another chat to discuss the rp in more detail?
I think it’d be fine to do next week! I just wanted to put it down somewhere so I wouldn’t forget
(( sure thing! I'll keep it in mind
Neat!

(( I had an idea as well for a potential RP. Basically a Matsu is in The woods or a fantasy world of some kind and gets kidnapped and toyed with by a clan of spider/human hybrids. Wrapped up in silk cocoons and forced to satisfy the clan in any way they desire.

Either that or we could expand on that where he gets toyed with by different types of monsters, like they make a pact with each other to lend him out for a week at a time
Oooh yeah I like that too
(( nice! we can focus on that one another time
Yup yup!
